title: Hackathon Wins: My Experience With CockroachDB at NWHacks 2017
description:
After winning the Best Node.js App using CockroachDB prize at NWHacks 2017, University of British Columbia student Trevin Wong writes about his experience with the database at the March event.
As I awoke to the noise of the SkyTrain, and the rays of sunlight streaming down on my face, I opened my eyes groggily to a beautiful mid-March day. Today was the start of nwHacks2017, touted as the biggest hackathon to hit the Northwest.
